How This System Works

Your enrollment system is designed to be simple yet powerful:

  1. You create workshops with dates, prices, and capacity limits
  2. Visitors browse and enroll on your website
  3. Payments are processed securely through Stripe
  4. Confirmations are sent automatically to both you and the customer
  5. You manage everything from your WordPress dashboard

What You‚Äôll Need

Before using this system, make sure you have:

  • ‚úÖ WordPress Admin Access - You‚Äôll need to log into your WordPress dashboard
  • ‚úÖ Stripe Account - Connected and configured (see Getting Started)
  • ‚úÖ Workshop Information - Dates, times, prices, and descriptions for your offerings

Getting Help

If you run into any issues:

  1. Check the Troubleshooting guide first
  2. Look for the specific topic in our user guides
  3. Contact your website administrator for technical issues

For Developers

  • Deployment Guide - Production deployment and configuration
